landing.introduction:
Jaaa hello guys! My name is WheelGPT! And especially mothers love me!

I am a Twitch bot made especially for Trackmania streamers. With me, your viewers can always check which map you are currently playing. They can also guess your next personal best time. To make everything run smoothly, you should install the OpenPlanet Plugin. Curious? Then add WheelGPT to your channel now!

login-failed.message: Failed to log in to Twitch. Please try again.

account.title: Account Information
account.text:
When you log in to wheelgpt.dev, some of your account information will be added to a local database. This information includes your Twitch Channel Name, your Twitch Channel ID, your Twitch Channel Display Name and an URL to your Twitch Channel Profile Pitcure.

Note that while we do use your authorized access token to verify it's your account, we don't actually store the access token. It is kept in memory for a very short period of time and then discarded.

access-log.title: Access Log
access-log.text: We store traffic logs which may contain your IP address and browser user agent, in order to see how the site is being used. These logs are regularly rotated out and are not permanent. In most cases, they are stored for a maximum of 24 hours.

questions.title: Questions
questions.text: If you have any questions related to our privacy policy, please send an email to markus.u.wieland@gmail.com or ask @sowiemarkus on Discord.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.text:
This website is operated by Markus Wieland.

Contact: markus.u.wieland@gmail.com

All content on this website is provided without any warranty. The author assumes no liability for the correctness, completeness, and topicality of the content. The use of the website is at your own risk.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Here you can adjust the settings for WheelGPT.

token.title: Your WheelGPT Token
token.description: This token is required to connect the OpenPlanet Plugin with WheelGPT. Copy the token and paste it into the plugin's settings.
token.note: The token is automatically generated when you open this page. Previous tokens remain valid and can still be used. If you have shown the token on stream, you should click "Renew Token" to generate a new one.

copy.title: Copy token to clipboard.
copy.error: Error copying the token. Please try again.

renew.title: Renew Token
renew.error: Error renewing the token. Please try again later.

init.error: Error retrieving the plugin token. Please try again later.

remove.success: WheelGPT was successfully removed from your channel.
remove.error: Error removing WheelGPT. Please try again later.

guess.description: Submit your guess for the best time on the current map.

myguess.description: View your current guess for the best time on the current map.

result.description: Manually end the guessing game with the final time.

map.description: Get information about the current map.

wgpt-emotes.description: Get a list of all emotes that WheelGPT uses. You should add them all to your channel.

format.description: Get information about the format in which you can submit your guess.
